comment.body: i think it is important work to improve basic sites like zeroblog ![image](http://127.0.0.1:43110/15mSYzsDxzarssqtV1pFPKqoCTaLdjVB2f/img/avatar.png)

i am a bit missing
- search feature
- following comments to a blog post without commenting
- admin should be able to auto follow comments to his posts

@geekless ZeroBlog++, click to add new post. Add title, tag and switch the body to markdown mode </>
paste:

<abbr title="description"><video controls="" loop=""><source src="/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/1KuwwnkAtVrfnyhv8pyGRxLqzNZbEkJt2u/DEF CON 25 - Svea Eckert- Andreas Dewes - Dark Data.mp4" type="video/webm"></video></abbr>

click Save

once done, go back to markdown post body editting mode and you find out the code is modified:

<abbr title="description"><video controls="" loop=""><source data-cke-saved-src="/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/1KuwwnkAtVrfnyhv8pyGRxLqzNZbEkJt2u/DEF CON 25 - Svea Eckert- Andreas Dewes - Dark Data.mp4" src="/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/1KuwwnkAtVrfnyhv8pyGRxLqzNZbEkJt2u/DEF CON 25 - Svea Eckert- Andreas Dewes - Dark Data.mp4" type="video/webm"></video></abbr>
